climbs.name: To the Grave
climbs.fa: Doug McDonald, Marty Lewis, Fred Berman, Brian Ketron

content.description: Steep seam leads to a difficult roof and up to a dihedral.
content.location: 3rd route from the right, in center of wall, just left of Brain Dead (13b)

content.description: Starts at a low roof on the right side of the Tombstone proper.  Pull the initial roof and head up a crack like feature to the second, bigger roof with a chain draw.  Crank over this roof on jugs and rock over to a stance on the arete.  Head back left on smaller holds and up a technical seam and a hard boulder problem, to more jugs and the ledge.  Look out for bird crap on the ledge.  Good climb on great rock, but slightly contrived since the crux could be avoided to the right on chossy but large holds.
content.protection: Eight protection bolts to two widely spaced open shuts.

content.description: The first moves are the most technical. After that, it's pretty straightforward. Bolts have been added to the route over the years and now the start, which used to be runout, is protected.
content.location: Just to the right of Regurgitator. Stairway to Heaven is the right most route in the corner that faces right.

content.description:
Same start as

Dilate

, clip first two bolts and then go right up a steep face through several bulges and a roof.
content.location: Start Dilate, then go right after 2nd bolt

climbs.name: Reanimator
climbs.fa: Marty Lewis, Mike Cann, Rob Stockstill

content.description: Steep section leads to an easier face, then follow a steep, strenuous seam.
content.location: Only route on the right-facing wall above rock pile. Left of To the Grave, Brain Dead, and Tales From the Crypt.

content.description: 11 bolts. Climb the white arete to a steep black headwall
content.location:
right of stairway to heaven 10a

left of reanimator 11d

climbs.name: Dilate
climbs.fa: Fred Berman, Steve Bacon, Janie Chodosh, Marty Lewis, 8/1996.

content.description:
Climb a left-leaning dihedral to double roofs. First two bolts are shared with

Regurgitator

. After the second bolt Dilate goes hard left while Regurgitator goes up and slightly right.
